actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize water supply for the Brazos River Basin, Texas.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of 1946 to revise provisions relating to projects in the Brazos River Basin, Texas, to provide that a specified portion of the conservation storage capacity of the Belton Reservoir on the Leon River shall be available for water supply (as well as irrigation) purposes in the Leon, Lampasas, and Little River Valleys.

titles.title: A bill to authorize water supply for the Brazos River Basin, Texas.
